activities: On an ongoing basis, our company anticipates receiving the following personal information from the European Union: Through our online registration forms, our company will collect names, mailing addresses including country, e-mailaddresses, and credit card information from visitors to our Website.  No additional information about the user's visit to the Richard Schmid site- or any other participating sites- is ever stored.  For each user to the company's Website, the company web server automatically recognizes the following:  the host origin of the request (the user's IP address), the referrer (where the user came from), the requested document (the page user is looking at), the user's browser type (e.g., Netscape 4.0) and the user's platform-dependent information (e.g. , Win '98).  (None of this information is stored on any individual who does not enroll).
contactoff1: Stove Prairie Press, LLC, P.O. Box 999, Walpole, N
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
